original_text: They chose 24 groups of musicians. There were 12 musicians in each group and each group had its leader. These were the names of the leaders of each group, from the first to the last that they chose:
korean_text: 스물넷째는 로맘디에셀이니 그의 아들들과 형제들과 십이 명이었더라

sentences.original_text: There were 12 musicians in each group
and each group had its leader.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 각 그룹에는 자신들의 지도자가 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: These were the names of the leaders of each group,
from the first to the last
